title: Call of the Sea: Special Edition
description: Heed the CallMermaids and Mystery beneath the ocean’s depths!After a heated fight at sea between twins Ben and Alex, Ben vanishes from their boat without a sound or even a ripple in the water. Unwavering in his dedication to find his brother, Alex begins the adventure of a lifetime armed only with the help of a local girl named Meg and his own mysterious musical abilities... the key to which, and to the mysteries that surround him, may be tied to the alluring song of the dangerous girl he finds among the ocean’s frothing waves.Can Alex unravel the mystery of her haunting song in time to save his brother?Download the book that BR Myers calls “a vividly imagined novel of folk lore and legends” today!This Special Edition celebrating the release of 'Drawn to the Tides' contains the short stories 'Lia's Lookout' and 'Poppy's Prologue'!
author: Amanda Labonté
